```{r}
library("rjson")
library("rtracklayer")
# Give the input file name to the function.

# Print the result.
print(result)
#convert to dataframe
fb_ids = sub("FLYBASE:", "", sapply(result$data, function(x)x$primaryId))
ref_gr = rtracklayer::import.gff("/Users/jiuntseng/Documents/Thermofly/ncRNA_genes_fb_2021_02.json")
ref_gr.lnc = subset(ref_gr, transcript_id %in% fb_ids)
```
